Text: Radar Station B-71:  To guard against potential invasions, the U.S. Army built "farm" buildings; the cinderblock structures, complete with shingled roofs, and fake windows and dormers, housed an early-warning radar station.

4:
--------------------
<Text: Radar Station B-71:  From the air, the sea, and even the road, these buildings appeared to be part of a working farm.>
